blockade-run.author: Fantasy Flight Games
blockade-run.name: Blockade Run
blockade-run.setup: The 3' edges of the play area become the player edges. Each player's deployment zone is within 2 range ruler lengths of his edge. The second player places all obstacles. Obstacles must be placed beyond 2 range ruler lengths of both player edges, and beyond distance 1 of other obstacles.
blockade-run.special_rule:
The second player assigns 1 objective token to each of his ships.
When a ship with an objective token is destroyed, the first player gains 1 victory token.
blockade-run.end_of_game: The second player gains 1 victory token for each ship with an objective token within the first player's deployment zone.

close-range-intel-scan.author: Fantasy Flight Games
close-range-intel-scan.name: Close-Range Intel Scan
close-range-intel-scan.setup: Place obstacles, adding the 2 dust fields, as normal.
close-range-intel-scan.special_rule:
While one of the second player's ships is attacking a ship, the attacker may spend 1 die with an :accuracy: icon. If it does, the attacker's owner gains 1 victory token.
While one of the first player's ships is attacking a ship, the attacker may spend 2 dice with :accuracy: icons. If it does, the attacker's owner gains 1 victory token.

station-assault.author: Fantasy Flight Games
station-assault.name: Station Assault
station-assault.setup: Place obstacles as normal, excluding the station. Then the second player places 2 stations in the setup area. Each station must be placed beyond distance 1 of all obstacles and beyond distance 3 of both players' edges. Both stations are Unarmed Stations; place both Unarmed Station cards near the second player's ship cards.
station-assault.special_rule: The first player's ships and squadrons cannot resolve an unarmed station's effect to discard damage cards or recover hull points when they overlap it.
station-assault.end_of_game: The second player gains 1 victory token for each unarmed station that is not destroyed. The first player gains 1 victory token for each unarmed station that is destroyed.

targeting-beacons.author: Fantasy Flight Games
targeting-beacons.name: Targeting Beacons
targeting-beacons.setup: After placing obstacles, the players alternate placing a total of 4 objective tokens in the setup area, starting with the second player.
targeting-beacons.special_rule: While one of the second player's ships is attacking a ship that is at distance 1-2 of an objective token, the attacker may reroll up to 2 attack dice in the attack pool.
